headline: A Quest That Has Translated Into New Investments
summary: My research colleague, John Bleday, and I have spent a lot of our time looking for great companies. How has the translated into new investments? Find out.

headline: Trump Media & Technology Group Stock Soars On A Nothingburger
summary: Trump Media's strategy of diversifying into multiple sectors without establishing a strong foothold in any one area is concerning and unsustainable. Learn more on DJT stock here.
